sn2.19:1: Setting at Rājagaha. Standing to one side, the young deva Uttarā recited this verse in the presence of the Blessed One:sn.i.55
sn2.19:2: v.310"Life is swept along, short is the life span;No shelters exist for one who has reached old age.Seeing clearly this danger in death,One should do deeds of merit that bring happiness."
sn2.19:3: v.11"Life is swept along, short is the life span;No shelters exist for one who has reached old age.Seeing clearly this danger in death,A seeker of peace should drop the world's bait."
